%

$ pick up

column6:
$ light
X  (! ANY fire>fire, not empty )
X  ( ! ANY ignate>ignate, empty )
add ( ! ANY fire>fire, ! ANY ignate> ignate )

$ dodge
X (Enabled, ! player>dodging)
X (Above Percent, ! player>agility, 50, 90, you fail to dodge)
enable(!player>dodging)
